metadata.title: Simfly.me - Premium Travel eSIMs | Connected Worldwide
metadata.description: Get high-speed internet in 190+ countries with our digital eSIMs. No roaming fees, instant activation. Travel smart with Simfly.me.

cart.title: CART
cart.checkoutError: Checkout could not be started. Please try again later.

defaultFaqs.question: How does activation work?
defaultFaqs.answer: After purchase, you'll receive a QR code via email. Simply scan it in your phone settings under 'Cellular'. The eSIM activates instantly.

defaultFaqs.question: When does the validity period start?
defaultFaqs.answer: The validity period starts only when the eSIM first connects to a supported network in the destination country.

defaultFaqs.question: Can I keep my WhatsApp?
defaultFaqs.answer: Yes! Your physical SIM remains active or can be disabled. Your WhatsApp number stays unchanged.

defaultFaqs.question: Is my phone compatible?
defaultFaqs.answer: Most smartphones from 2019 onwards (iPhone 11+, Google Pixel 3+, Samsung S20+) support eSIM. Use our checker above for details.
